name: Program Level Outcomes Evaluation (PLOE)
description: The PLOE data set provides a list of competencies and learning objectives related to the org unit selected and provides insight into outcome achievement across multiple courses within a program. Data comes from the Competencies tool, not the Learning Outcomes tool. Required Config Variable d2l.Tools.AdvancedDataSets.ProgramOrgUnitTypeId (set the org unit type ID that represents a program for an org) Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute PLOE (Organization level)

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: The org unit for which we want to collect results

columns.name: OrgUnitName
columns.description: The name of the org unit

columns.name: OrgUnitCode
columns.description: The code of the org unit

columns.name: Program
columns.description: The program is a custom org unit type, with the filter parameter passed in. There should be one line per program.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: Identifier of the competency or learning outcome

columns.name: OutcomeType
columns.description: Type of outcome. Options are Competency or Learning Objective

columns.name: OutcomeStatus
columns.description: Status of the outcome Competency status options are Draft, In Review, Approved, or ArchivedLearning Objective options are Ready for evaluation or Not ready for evaluation

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: First name of the learner being assessed by the outcome

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: Last name of the learner being assessed by the outcome

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Username of the learner being assessed by the outcome

columns.name: OrgDefinedId
columns.description: Identifier of the learner defined by the org unit

columns.name: RoleName
columns.description: Name of the user's role in the org unit

columns.name: RoleId
columns.description: Identifier of the user's role in the org unit

columns.name: IsAchieved
columns.description: Indicates if the outcome is achieved. 1=Achieved, 0=Not achieved, Null=not assessed

columns.name: AchievementDateTime
columns.description: Indicates the date and time the achievement was accomplished
